Tumusiime Rushedge (1941 ruo afọ 2008) bụ onye dọkịta na-awa ahụ na Uganda, onye na-anya ụgbọelu, onye na'akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye na na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ
A maara ya dị ka "Tom rush"
O dere kọlụm kwa izu na "Sunday Vision", nke a na-akpọ "Old Fox"
Ọ bụ ụbụrụ dị n'azụ ihe nkiri Ekanya, nke a na-ebipụta kwa ụbọchị na "New Vision"

Ihe osise ndị ahụ na-elekwasị anya na onye aṅụrụma Ekanya na nwunye ya na-alụ ọgụ Rosie, ma nọgide na-ewu ewu kemgbe mmalite afọ 1970.
Ọ bụ onye dere akwụkwọ akụkọ, "The corrupt, the quick and the dead".
A mụrụ Tumusiime n'ọnwa Machị 1, 1941 na mpaghara Buhweju, Bushenyi District
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ asaa, nke Rev
Ọ tolitere n'ụlọ Ndị Kraịst ma n'oge ọ bụ nwata, ọ na-etinye aka nke ukwuu na Emmanuel Church Kabwohe dị ka onye na-akụ ọkpọ na-akpọ ndị na-efe ofufe na ozi Sunday.
Ọ gara Kibubura Boys Primary School na Ibanda, maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya
Maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara Mbarara High School (1954-1957) na Ntare School (1958-1960)
O mepụtara baajị ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Ntare mgbe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ
Ọ gụrụ ọgwụ na Mahadum Makerere n'afọ 1961
N'ebe ahụ, ọ rụpụtara ihe ọzọ ma na 1966 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nsọpụrụ, na-aga n'ihu na-ahụ maka ntị, imi na akpịrị (ENT)
O nwetara diplọma post-graduate na Medical School
Ọ gara maka agụmakwụkwọ ọzọ na US wee nweta nzere masta na ịwa ahụ na Chicago
Maka ihe ọ rụzuru na ngalaba ahụike nke ENT na neurology, e nyere ya prọfesọ.
